modName: taldyn ash-skin the brother of athis
summary: taldyn,a complete overhaul of the companion athis,with his own little back story
descriptionHtml: Athis,a new member of the companions faces death from either the dragonborn or the hands of a drugar deathlord,his brother,Taldyn,comes to skyrim only to be faced by volkaihar vampires,he slays them but becomes one,and now he will try to find who killed his brother,with the dragonborns help of course.
author: kealthas
